column4: I have lucid lynx. I am using a cellphone card as a modem(by using HSDPA modem), is there any software in ubuntu which I can use to make texting while using the card?
the modem has its windows software to do that, but I want to do it in ubuntu
I see, just a second, I saw a software for that
very nice. thank you very much
wow, I do not think that in ubuntu there is such software :D
You mean it's not in the repos?
Also, Gammu/Wammu are also available for Windows, so you can use those in case your built-in modem's software is broken (like it was for me)
I do not use windows. but the software for the modem is provided for windows only. that is why I need the software replacement for ubuntu
in fact, I have to use usb_modeswitch each time I want to use the modem because it is only detected as a storage
Have you tried writing an udev rule to automate that?
